reviews.review: Easily better than the 1st Avengers, and doesn't suffer the plot missteps of that 2nd one.  Objectively I gotta say Black Panther is the best for general audiences, but IW might not be that crazy for casuals.  Engaging and cohesive, with a fleshed out villain..must see again!
Super troopers was fast passed humer . Infinity Wars not worth the time or money! No spoilers but we do have Marvell comics .turn back time and start over

Take my money! I appreciate this movie. Perfectly balanced....I'm giving this my first 100%. 

That's how you make a quality film Rian Johnson..

I'm going to see it again, but I'm going to take some time to process first. As far as sequels go, this movie makes Empire Strikes Back look like Finding Dori (think back, the same number of good guys die in both films). 

Part 2 may take away a lot of the sting via Deus Ex Machina, but we have more Marvel movies out between now and then, so this is going to be the way it is for awhile.
Pelicula comica, no se toma en serio, muchas cosas pasan convenientemente, el cgi del villano no est√° terminado,  muchas cosas del trailer no aparecen en la pelicula.
This was an emotional roller coaster I have never felt these emotions in a movie

Infinity War takes this mcu fan for a roller coaster ride.  I have stood in line for 10 years to ride this ride and I will ride it again.  love the way the movie did not follow the comic and did its own thing.  (much like walking dead on Amc)  
Acting/setting: This is a very dark, emotional Marvel Movie. It has to be. each star had their opportunity to shine.  writing was easy to follow, witty and left very few "holes of wonder".  I appreciated the locations the director took us... From Space (you will understand when you see it) to the jungle of the battle scene.
Photography - special effects were great in 3D.  Worth the extra $$.  3d was not cheese, rather light and enjoyable.  did not make me dizzy from too much motion.  Color and shadows were good and most of the time felt real.  Enjoyed the overall "sight" of the film 
Sound and soundtrack were great.  Sound effects was what I expected.  The fight scene was almost at a level of Lord of the Ring (return of the king version).  While space "things" had sound to give audiences a feel of "getting it done".  Soundtrack built up the scenes and you can hear the audience clap when the avengers' theme blared overhead.  The soundtrack did not over power the scenes and helped move the setup over and over.
What I would have liked to see...  Black Panther on Sale in 4K prior to the Movie release.  Why?  So- during my MCU marathon I would be ready for anything.
Watch again?
Rentability - A+
To Buy - A+.  This one I will get in 4K.
Did wife fall asleep?  - no!
I rank this movie as a Full Beer Stein.
A must see for all Marvel fans, an excellent movie with its fair share of action, homour and tragic moments. Looking forward to Avengers 4!

What an amazing movie.  The best Marvel movie every made.  It was epic, action packed, emotional, and amazing.  Well worth the 10 year wait.  It had me at the edge of my seat from the first minute of the movie.  WOW!!!
